name: 2022 7th International Conference on Water Pollution and Treatment
content: Publication: Accepted and published papers can be published in Journal of Environmental Science and Development (IJESD, ISSN:2010-0264), which is indexed by Scopus (Since 2019) and included in the Chemical Abstracts Services (CAS), CABI, Ulrich Periodicals Directory, Electronic Journals Library, Crossref, ProQuest. Or can be published into International Conference Proceedings, which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS), Inspec,et al.
